storyInfo: Skyfire attends an event in place of a councilor, but gets caught in a kidnapping. Realizing there's a plot driving the enemy, she casts to put a stop to it.

attributes.content: November 23rd, 1097, 8:45 P.M.
Huff, I'm worn to the bone...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Who do these people think they are, and where do all their funny ideas come from? What in the world goes on in their heads?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Those councilors are nothing but—
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Nothing but—idiots!!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Pff.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: I'm so sorry you have to sit there noting everything they said. You must feel like a stack of broken records...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Their proposals aren't even for the sake of the Infected. How much speaking between the lines can an institution with the final say on Infected capacity do? Are they under the impression no one has a clue what they're up to?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Whatever institution gets to call the shots, whatever standards they allot work by once their shots are called, whatever work unit gets priority for taking on Infected employees... Of course I know what's going on, it's all a game of interests.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: They haven't discussed the reality for the Infected, but they don't wrestle over what benefits who either, so what is the SENSE in them prattling on and on in circles?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: The councilors are all noble-sorts. Whether or not they'd give Infected reality any thought, they don't and won't argue about slicing the cake in open view.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: They haven't hashed out a single thing since this meeting started! Each of them has been saying Infected on loop, but they've made ZERO progress!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Everyone's denying everyone else's motions, but nobody's even pulled out a single useful solution. What ARE they producing all these proposals for?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: That's their form of contact-free war, Skyfire. Victorian city councils all go through this rigmarole before the allocation of interests they actually mean ever gets carried out.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: And then that Councilor Janeway—
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Saying he's doing it to help the Infected make more money, have more freedom of choice, live a better quality of life. Oh, he makes himself sound SO charitable.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: 'If we place no restrictions on the Infected's work hours, then they'll be free to choose their own, and that's more money in their bank.'
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Your imitation's startling.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: ...That smarmy hypocrite tone of his really makes my stomach churn!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: He knows full well just how scant Infected pay can be, and the bulk of it doesn't even land in their own pockets. And he still acts like he's been pouring his heart out for... drgh.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: He did suggest a plan of action—reconstruct the Infected neighborhood directly into a factory so all the people have work, assigned living quarters, and can provide for themselves. It's a patch on most countries' policies, you can't even argue that.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Keh!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: They're all too arrogant here.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Hm? Something else up?
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Like those lords opposed to any new policy for the Infected...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Saying they want all the foreign Infected out, no matter how long they've been here, if they've settled down, if they've already adapted to life here...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: All their proposals are just about driving these people out. And then what? You want those Infected refugees running out their time in the wastelands?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Have they thought for one second about where these people at the end of their rope are going to go?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Pff.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: *Sigh* That's a council for you.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Excuse me...?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: That's a council for you.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: If anyone here was actually looking out for the Infected, then they wouldn't call it the council anymore. They'd call it an Infected aid association.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: The aim of both sides is very clear. They want to rule out the most infeasible plans in public first, then negotiate concessions with other so they can find equilibrium, and that's business as usual.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: But a lot of people have been counting on the 'White Wolf' Count to declare where he stands. I think it caught everyone off that his vote was to abstain today.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: 'White Wolf' Skamandros... He hasn't expressed any governmental viewpoint for a good half a year. And it's anyone's guess why...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: This shouldn't be... This can't be...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Ah—I was the most naive one in the whole room.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I thought there'd be a few clear heads, at the very least. Even if they're out to keep Caladon running at status quo, at least they'd bring forth a few proposals that resembled reality.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: But they're just using the council as a place to game each other. What's driving them is how they alone can profit.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Oh, you're repeating yourself, Miss Mountbelan. At least now you know they're all self-interested sorts when you go back in? The fact shouldn't shock you at this point.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Hold on, I thought you didn't drink...
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: If they think this is fine, then it's all going to blow up sooner or later!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Mmm?
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: One day, sooner or later, mark my words! Constant oppression, constant exploitation! How long can this hold for? Do they really not understand? Nobody wants to live this way...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Even if they only have the faintest glimmer of hope, they want to survive! They'll break their backs to survive! I know that full well!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: ...Miss Mountbelan, I think you lost the thread somewhere along the way.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: No one's born evil. No one's born stripping other people of their lives for fun... From the very beginning, they were all just Infected endeavoring to survive.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Mm—and I'm just a friend endeavoring to stop you drinking any more.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Are they just meant to settle with being inferior, tuck themselves away? Were those lords meant to be born as nobles, meant to exploit them for their own interests?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: It's a house of idiots! If none of them ever think to rein it in, the Infected are bound to revolt sooner or later...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: These ungrasped questions... everyone's lives will be destroyed...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: We can't let all the... Reunion business... happen again...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: No, we can't, and you can't take a single glass more. You've drunk plenty enough. Just leave it for a moment. Water?
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: No! I was still drinking that... give me another! They won't listen to me... I'm the one in the right!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Mm... 'I'm the one in the right'...
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Sticking fast to your own views is exactly why Councilor Angst fetched you.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Mm?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: A noble in isolate, with foresight and a clear mind.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: But those short-sighted Caladon old guard wouldn't comprehend him.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: They would never reform, unless their interests were damaged right before their eyes.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Is that clear enough for you, Miss Too-Much-to-Drink? I know I'll probably have to repeat myself once you sober up again.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Buhh-huh-huh-hoo...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What are you crying for now?
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: The glass... stuck to my hand! Boo-hoo-hoo...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: No it's not, no it's not, I got it off for you, I got it off. It's not stuck.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: If they're all going to be so dead wrong and still think they're so right... then this world's done for...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Oh, and she's out like a light.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: November 23rd, 1097, 10:45 P.M.
Are you up? You passed out just like that in the middle of the dinner party. Even if you had me with you, that was all too careless of you.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: ...I feel sick...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: You know, I've been getting more and more fond of you.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: You're a spoiled rich lady, but your goodwill towards the Infected and the rest of the destitute ended up so genuine anyway. You know how big the problem in this city is, don't you? Do you want to change Caladon a little for the better?
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: And you're well aware I'm just a recorder from the town archives at the moment. If I want to climb my way up, I need the right person. How about you and I talk some back-alley talk, you lead the fore, and I'll be right there mucking with you?
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: You know Councilor Jones? The one who signed the proposal in joint with Councilor Janeway. But in reality...
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Part of the money they've built the factory with gets allocated by Caladon Council, as it happens. And, well, there's a giant question mark on if all that money's actually gone to the factory.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Standard affair between Caladon's nobility, really.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: If you can think of a way to get to the bottom of this, then forcing them to compromise won't be a pipe dream!
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: Wow~
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: You really... know a lot!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Well, I've said my part. Now, have you heard any hearsay about? Tell me a thing or two, let's exchange information~
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: I have! I have—I, I'm going to make them realize how wrong they are! I'm... the one in the right!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Brilliant...
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: You're still drunk.
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: (Fine background, good of heart, understands a bit of politics, but has never gotten involved in any of the practice. Still a little naivety left. Her sort usually get a nasty shock from how ruthless reality is...)
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: (She's definitely heard about how it works on paper before, but this should be her first time witnessing any Victorian legislative assembly for herself. She reckons she knows it all, but she's got a long way to travel still.)
attributes.name: Kite the Recorder

attributes.content: November 24th, 1097, 9:20 A.M.
...Who is it?! Ugh... You know I'm off today...?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: O—Oh! Mr. Midley? Oh, I'm very sorry about that, did you need anything?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Councilor... no... Professor Angst? What's wrong with him? Sudden heart issues? Someone broke into his house last night?! Is he alright? Is he at the hospital?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Alright, alright, if he's stable then that's good. You should have told me last night... should I go to the hospital right now?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Event? You want me to attend for you? Not a problem, I'll get ready now.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I understand. Enquire after Infected opinion, make the government's stance clear. Yes, I understand.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What in the world? Petty thieves breaking into councilors' houses...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Fine, I'm happy to go. I get to shed light on a few things I'm still curious about. Urgh... my head's still pounding from last night...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: How did I... how did I return last night...? It feels like I said so much at the dinner party. What did I tell Kite about? What did she even tell me about?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Well, first things first!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: In an open area in the Infected community, a large crowd of the Infected are gathered.
A blue-blooded Member of the Council wanting to chat with them. Now there's something new.
With looks of both curiosity and doubt, they gaze at the tidily dressed girl before them.
Didn't they say that Councilor man was coming today?
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Look, see what I told you? None of those old codgers would come themselves. They hardly want to get up close with us.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Fact remains they sent someone at all, though. What are they up to?
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Ahem...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Not a worry, everyone, say whatever you want to say. I'll pass on all the issues you raise to Councilor Angst.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (Whisper) You first.
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: (Whisper) Why me? Why not you?
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: We'll start with the man over there, then.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Eh? Me?
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Yes, how long do you reckon you've been working here?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Not more than half a year.
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: ...Can't remember it now.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: So, whereabouts did you come from?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Ursus...?
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Compared to before, how do you feel life is now? Is your daily workload too much?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I don't have to risk my life down in the underground arenas, at least... Yeah, I can get by and scrape up a living. It's okay.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: They said being at this event would still count as work, and we'd still get paid. Is that true?
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: That, I can assure you. After the event's over, we'll reimburse you all.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: So, have you ever had your pay docked before, or not come on time?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: You can tell me, it's alright! I wouldn't let your information slip!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I see how it is, then... I'd like to ask, your family lives about...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Just right in this neighborhood. We're all in one bed, and they provided us bedding for the first day's wages. It's a bit thin, but we all squeeze up in the winter, so it's not that cold.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Several people in one household, I see... So are there any elderly here?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Factory won't take them on. They can't take the physical labor.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: The ones who have kids might be let in here to live, but it's hard to say. The ones without... maybe there'll be work fit for old people, and they'll accept, but that's not easy either.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Then can you tell me about your meals and pay here? Including if anyone's ever had their wages deducted?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: We eat straight in the factory. I get to eat a half-decent amount, at least. Better than working on an empty tank.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: And pay, well... hahah...
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Thing about pay is, times are, the supervisor...
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: He tells us the Originium on us rubs onto the goods, and now the product's contaminated and they can't sell it, so they won't pay us.
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Those people, honestly... They do one thing and say another...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: It's always like that. And they said recently our factory's had bad results so they won't raise our wages. And they'll drag a whole lot out at once whenever they please, hire new ones after a bit, and they get paid even less...
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: We've got no room for a say. The council won't even let us in, and not one of them listens.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Mm, that much I've noted...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Normally, now and then we'd head to a pub close by, kick our feet up once we're off work... but this morning, they had a fire break out.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Bloody right. There's just been no end to it lately.
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: A fire? The... 'Green Spark' pub?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: When did it happen? Just this morning?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: How? What about the girl running the place? Is she alright?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Ah, that we're not too sure of ourselves. The regulars there said they've been searching for her all this time, but they haven't the faintest where she's run to...
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: What's happening?
attributes.name: Infected Employees

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*... What's going on?!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Left side, right side, by the plan! Grab them all! Go!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: (An explosion? This is the scent of Originium explosives...)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Let go of me, let go of me! What the hell are you lot doing?!
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Wh-Who the hell are you all—
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Keep it down! Stuff their mouths!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: (Infected? Why?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (Four, six, eight, ten... this is odd, where did they all come from? Where are all the guards?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (...What are they taking the workers for? What is it they want?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (No, hold on... they're tying them up right in the street, no hesitation. They were clearly ready for this...)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (I need to see what this bunch intend on doing.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Take that girl away as well.
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: You behave.
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Let go of me. I can walk by myself.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Hurry it up, move! Into the van, is that everyone? Go, take them all to the factory!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Got them all, boss!
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Shut the door! Go, go, go!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: (It's been a twenty-minute journey, and they've taken turn after turns along the way. These people are on the watchout.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (These ties are practically insulting, using material as regular as this. I could burn these to nothing in a heartbeat.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (Now we're at... the factory? It's barren! Where are all the facilities?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (Strange...)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Why are you taking us?!
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: L-Let us go! We—I-I've got a family waiting for me to send money back! For Pete's sakes, let us go...!
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Shh, settle down! Now stay there!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: I'm telling you, someone'll have the police on you, kidnapping all these people in the street!
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: The sooner you let us go, the gentler they might be on you when the time comes...
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: You're pulling my leg, the police? You think that scares us?
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Now shut your yaps and behave, the lot of you!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Y—You're all Infected too! What kind of business is this?!
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: You'll be done for in the end if you carry on like this!
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: You can zip it.
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Ugh—
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: We said be-bloody-have! Okay? Keep prattling and you're done for right now!
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: I'm warning you lot, don't try anything funny with us. If I find a single one of you even thinking of any Originium Arts, I'll cave your head in, understand?
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Now be still!
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: (These people, honestly... This is the least creative villainy.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (...I won't let them off easily, soon enough.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (But just what are they up to...?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What about that councilor? Where's he? Weren't we nabbing an old man? Why've we got a little miss instead?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Same difference. Old boy, young girl, it's fine as long as we have them.
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: (So they were coming after Councilor Angst.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: So what now?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: We're waiting for the signal from the rest. Just get ready for now.
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Did everything end up here?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: We only took half.
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Then remember, when you head back, drop past the shot building by the old border part of the city. Do away with all the bomb stuff and the chemicals. It's dangerous leaving it there. Don't let it bite us in the arse.
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Right! The safehouse and all that. I almost forgot.
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: And the stuff the Danton brothers hid for getting out of the city. Make sure that's ready to go too.
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: That's money, clothes, false IDs, and the essential weapons! Don't forget any of it!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Oi, oi, take it easy, they're all listening!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: What's the matter? They're dead before they'll get to talk.
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Plonk those explosives in place, move it.
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: You lot watch these Infected, we're off to work.
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Righto.
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: (...Are those all bombs?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (The factory's got no machines, it's just bombs after bombs... were they all moved here?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (It looks like I don't need to keep wasting more time.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (Lucky I'm carrying a reserve Arts Unit, or else things would be very tricky.)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: She gives her ring a rub, the black gem's surface emitting a flicker of bright light.
Hey, what happened to your ropes?
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Shh, keep it down. No matter what you hear next, just stay put and don't come out.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: A... Alright...
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Someone's running for it!
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: How? Who tied the ropes?
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Oh, look at you, pretty little kitten! Thinking of scarpering on your own?
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Look at that waist, though, heheh. I tell you, you put that in my hands and I could—
attributes.name: Infected Hooligan

attributes.content: Honestly, you people really... sicken me...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Boom.
The violent sound of the detonation rings through the entire factory.
Along with the raging flames of the Originium Arts and fragments of the interior walls, several hooligans fall to the ground and are knocked out.
The Originium crystals fall away from their bodies in the heat, dropping to the floor.
Were these... stuck on? No, wait, this is just glass painted black!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: (Fake Infected?)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What the hell happened!?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: You useless ballsacks, I told you to watch them! Some shit mess you've made!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Who got you to do this? Why are you disguised as Infected?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: No, let's be clear... you have no Infected among you at all, do you?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: You bloody woman... not half-bad at this, are you?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: What's it matter if we do or don't?
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: You're not getting out of here alive. Who's going to know the truth?
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Communicating with you lot is really wearing me out...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What are you trying?
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Park yourself on back, now! Else I'm done playing nice!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: (It's clear they'll kill to silence, but they're still menacing us into complying using their arms. There's no logic to it at all...)
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Just try and threaten me with those weapons, go on.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: How many people like you do you think I've dealt with before?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: The flames dance across the ground, drawing a brilliant show of firelight.
Piled in a corner, the resin shells of the Originium bombs melt apart in the blaze.
Their crystalline electronic components laid bare, they let out a boom.
The cores of the explosives emit blinding rays of light, then deactivate.
The bombs! The bombs got cooked!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Why didn't they explode? What happened?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Are you thick?! It's Originium Arts! She's a Caster!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: Shit! We're in for it, now!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: I'm giving you two choices.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: First, you surrender nicely. I've got a lot I intend on asking you, still.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I'm not recommending the other choice, because right now, I'm in a VERY bad mood.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Piss off! Who do you think we are?!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Come on, boys, do her in! Do all these Infected in!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Excuse me! Did you not see those Originium Arts just now?!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: How many people in Caladon could pull off Arts of that caliber?! Are you still going to resist?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: What the hell is running through those brains of yours?!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Yeah, and what's all the fuss?! You're just a Caster!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: I've seen a sight and a half, the places I've been! We've got Casters too! Show me what she's made of, go on!
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: *Sigh* And I've had enough...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Wait! No! We have to leg it!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: What now?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Her! I just remembered! She's not a normal Caster!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: It's King's Wand! She's that Mountbelan family's...
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Rough Hooligan

attributes.content: Enough questions! Run!
attributes.name: Ugly Hooligan

attributes.content: A lively flame springs from the young lady's palm, its licks surging upwards. The sound of metal cracking under the sheer heat bursts forth before her, as if a gargantuan creature emerges from the blaze, awoken from its slumber.

The flames' light laps past the shattered fluorescents, flowing over the pillars, the air warped and twisting in the heat's dance. Only the flames themselves, sweeping about the debris on the factory floor, shine brighter, fiercer, more brilliantly.
The hooligans are wide-eyed and slack-jawed in terror, not daring to twitch a muscle.
Amidst this sea of chaos, the flames' tongues play gently with the ends of the lady's hair, unable to harm her in the slightest.
...Kneel before the flame of the heavens.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: And all of it is thrown down, the resplendent red light filling their eyes, until soon enough they can see no more.
The lady brings down her two arms, held high.
That... that was marvelous.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: You're... incredible!
attributes.name: Infected Citizen

attributes.content: Are the others alright? Is anyone hurt?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: We're fine, we're all fine.
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: The Caster turns around, intending to help up the Infected.
When from behind, a figure hidden away in a corner comes charging a her.
Shit... bloody Caster, it's you or me!
attributes.name: Hooligan Mercenary

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Hooligan Mercenary

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: From a staircase beneath the ceiling, a nimble silhouette quickly flits through the opening overhead, disappearing from Skyfire's line of sight.
Miss Caster, are you still fine?
attributes.name: Infected Worker

attributes.content: I'm alright.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Help me with the others! First things first, we all get out of here!
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: November 27th, 1097, 6:40 A.M.
Kidnapping Infected? Blowing up the factory?
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: Right, though I still can't make sense of what in the world they were trying at.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Odd indeed...
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: What about those bandits you got? Did they say anything?
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: Things were a bit of a mess there. I might've gotten slightly heavy-handed...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Never mind. I won't ask for the details.
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: Disguising as Infected to bomb a factory... I do have a guess for what made them do this.
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: Trying to capture those few runaways might pose some difficulty.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: It's not too realistic to hope the guards look into an Infected community case, either.
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: And some other things are puzzling me about this... I could swear I saw...
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Forget it, let's not mind this for now. Have any of you found Miss Susie yet?
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: I'm sorry, but not yet. I've already sent people to search. The guards say they saw her there when it caught on fire, but she quickly ran off in tears.
attributes.name: Bitter Root

attributes.content: I'll search too if needs must... I'm a little worried for her.
attributes.name: Skyfire

attributes.content: Mr. Root! Open the door! Mr. Root!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: Mr. Root! I'm begging you, save her!
attributes.name: Susie

attributes.content: We've got an Infected who's almost gone, help us!
attributes.name: Red

attributes.content: Susie? Mr. Red? What happened??
attributes.name: Skyfire
